title: I can't play zoe
body: I just want know why I can't play zoe rn. I just bought her with rp went to play a game with her and could not help plz.

replies.body: Looks like you were able to get into a game with her a couple days ago on the 8th, were you still having problems using her in games?
No I was not able to play her at all. On the selection menu it would not show her. But I could play her yesterday and the day before that. In game zoe worked fine.
Hmmm taking another look for you right now!

I hope the problem is being looked at but I can see the little free rotation icon in champ select peaking above summonerspells... I think the scrollbar is broken and people are able to pick her by selecting mastery sortation instead of alphabetical order

Strange, Zoe is definitely still unlocked on your account and you should be able to use her. Try running a quick repair just in case some files got borked somehow, but if that doesn't help reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
I am having the exact same problem,  bought her 2 weeks ago, played a couple games with her no problem and then for the past 4 days I cant select her in champ select even though I own her
Nvm, all of a sudden I can choose her again, no idea why or how
Same Here I Purchased Zoe But I'am Unable To Choose Her In Champ Select I Hope The Automatic Repair Will Help
